metadata.title: CVE-2023-38652 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple integer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the VZTvzt_rd_block_vch_decode dict parsing functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. Aspecially crafted .vzt file can lead to memory corruption. A victim wouldneed to open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the integer overflow when num_time_ticks is notzero.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
